title: NAVMC 1553.1A LP Format
content: Format the output as a partial Lesson Plan following the 4-step process (Introduction, Presentation, Application, Test) as defined in NAVMC 1553.1A.

title: 5-Paragraph Order (SMEAC)
content: Provide the output in the standard Five Paragraph Order format: Situation, Mission, Execution, Administration and Logistics, Command and Signal.

title: Standard Naval Letter
content: Format the response as a Standard Naval Letter, including the proper header, 'From', 'To', 'Subj', 'Ref', and paragraph structure.

title: Learning Objectives (TLO/ELO)
content: Output a set of Termainal Learning Objectives (TLO) and Enabling Learning Objectives (ELO) with correctly formatted Condition, Behavior, and Standard statements.
